item.title: Ronan The Head-Bopping Sea Lion Proves Animals Can Keep A Beat
item.description: Ronan the sea lion can groove to rock and electronica, but the 15-year-old's talent shines most in bobbing to disco hits like "Boogie Wonderland."

item.title: Brazilian Nun Who Was Also World's Oldest Person Dies At 116
item.description: Sister Inah Canabarro was just weeks short of turning 117, her religious congregation said.
